name: opensphere-asm
description: WebAssembly and asm.js module for Open Sphere. Built with [emscripten](https://github.com/kripken/emscripten).
author: William Wall <wwall@caci.com>

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage:
Please fix your commit message (consider using 'npm i -g commitizen'). Well-formatted commit messages allow us to automate our changelog.

Examples:
"fix(binding): Fixed error in library usage"
"feat(post): added window exposure"

If you have installed commitizen, try running 'git cz'.
